thread.title: U.N. turns its attention to Reuters report on Myanmar

title: U.N. turns its attention to Reuters report on Myanmar
text:
U.N. turns its attention to Reuters report on Myanmar 2:34am EST - 02:07 
Members of the U.N. Security Council on Tuesday called for the release of two Reuters journalists who were working on an investigation into the killing of Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar and and were arrested by the authorities.   
Members of the U.N. Security Council on Tuesday called for the release of two Reuters journalists who were working on an investigation into the killing of Rohingya Muslims in Myanmar and and were arrested by the authorities.  //reut.rs/2EHQUEJ
